summary: The Nordic Assault Bow is a scoped bow weapon - Designed for immersive first person archery without UI-Crosshair
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=Deepskyblue][size=+3]Nordic Assault Bow[/size][/color][color=Lightgrey]

[b]The Nordic Assault Bow is a scoped bow weapon and part of the [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/?]Scoped Bows[/url][b]Â mod[/b]

Designed for immersive first person archery without UI-Crosshair

[url=http://i.imgur.com/Ke6Alcg.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/l6H0ODP.jpg[/img][/url]
KlICK on THE PICTURES to see them BIG!
[url=http://i.imgur.com/GFfZ80X.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/LTajtCC.jpg[/img][/url]
KlICK on THE PICTURES to see them BIG!
[url=http://i.imgur.com/vFROfOz.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/5FEfhlH.jpg[/img][/url]
KlICK on THE PICTURES to see them BIG!
[url=http://i.imgur.com/awGdiLk.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/kdAnRW2.jpg[/img][/url]
KlICK on THE PICTURES to see them BIG!
[url=http://i.imgur.com/p0IGdXC.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/dbMI2D7.jpg[/img][/url]
[/color][/center][color=Lightgrey]



[size=+2][color=Deepskyblue]Install - Notes[/color][/size][color=Lightgrey]

[b]This mod adds a new bow to the game.[/b] There is nothing else under the hood.
This mod
-is scriptfree.
-can not break your game or saves.
-can be installed and uninstalled at any time.
-can not affect other mods.


[/color][u]Install:[/u][color=Lightgrey]
1.)Download and install one main file
2.)OPTIONAL: Download and install Options if you like them
3.)Play and have Fun!

[/color][u]Uninstall:[/u][color=Lightgrey]
1.)Uninstall all Optional files if you have used any.
2.)Uninstall the Main file.
3.)Go to hell!

[u]Load Order:[/u]
Doesn't matter. I would place it somewhere in the middle, in case other mods need to be at the top or bottom.

[u]Upgrade Instruction:[/u]
You can upgrade to the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/?]Scoped Bows[/url] mod at any time. Just uninstall this mod and install Scoped Bows. You will not lose any bows from this separate release.



[size=+2][color=Deepskyblue]How To Get in Game[/color][/size][color=Lightgrey]

[u]Crafting:[/u]
-it is craftable and can be crafted at any Forge (advanced armors perk required)
-it is Improveable and Enchantable like any vanilla weapon

[u]Cheating (Console Command):[/u]
open the console with [/color][b]^[/b][color=lightgray]
1.)type: [/color][b]help "nordic assault bow"[/b][color=lightgray] it will show up with it's id
2.)type: [/color][b]player.additem xxxxxxxx 1[/b][color=lightgray] (instead of x type the numbers of the id - the 1 at the end stands for the number of bows that you will get)[/color]




[/color][size=+2][color=Deepskyblue]Recommended Mods and ini Tweaks[/color][/size][color=Lightgrey]

For the best experience i recommend to use all suggested mods and ini tweaks below in combination.

[/color][u]MODS:[/u]
[color=MediumTurquoise]->[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11941/?]ABT - Arrows and Bolts Tweaks[/url][color=MediumTurquoise] (50% faster arrows) Makes arrows faster and reduces the gravity for a higher range. (+other options) [/color][color=gray]Highly Recommended![/color]

[color=MediumTurquoise]->[/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3222/?]Immersive Hud[/url][color=MediumTurquoise] Disable the crosshair for ranged weapons. (+other options/MCM) [/color][color=gray]Highly Recommended![/color]

[color=MediumTurquoise]->[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26387/?]Simple Crosshair[/url][color=MediumTurquoise] Choose "Oblivion Style Sneak Eye - No Crosshair" to move the sneak eye down between health and magicka bar. [/color][color=gray]Highly Recommended![/color][color=lightgray]


[/color][u]TWEAKS:[/u] (skyrim.ini) [color=gray]Highly Recommended![/color][color=lightgray] (backup your .ini file first)
[/color][color=MediumTurquoise]
[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=12288.0000
[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7

[/color][color=gray]For information about the ini-tweaks read the "ABT - Arrows and Bolts Tweaks" mod description. (link above) Ini-tweaks are also working without that mod.[/color]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/color][center][size=+1]Please visit [color=lightgray]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/?[/color] to get all [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/?]Scoped Bows[/url]![/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[url=http://i.imgur.com/f4oVkBf.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/XRi3hTq.jpg[/img][/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Endorsements, comments, pictures and videos are always appreciated!
Have Fun! :)

Outlaw
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
author: OutLaw666
